title: Thinking of Buying an EV as Gas Prices Surge?
sub_head: Electric vehicles are growing in popularity, but can be hard to find. What to know before you buy.
body:
With gasoline prices reaching record highs, some Americans are considering going electric.
Many are also wondering, however, whether an electric vehicle—which can cost thousands more upfront than a gas-powered car—makes practical and financial sense to save a few dollars at the pump.
